sections.heading: Parents' rights of administrationIn addition to the rights of tutorship, the parents shall retain, during the marriage and during the minority of the child under full or limited continuing tutorship, all rights of administration granted to parents of children not under continuing tutorship during th
sections.text: Parents' rights of administrationIn addition to the rights of tutorship, the parents shall retain, during the marriage and during the minority of the child under full or limited continuing tutorship, all rights of administration granted to parents of children not under continuing tutorship during their minority.Acts 1966, No. 496, ยง2; Acts 2014, No. 811, ยง30, eff. June 23, 2014; Acts 2024, No. 123, ยง1.
